quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I don't have dreams, I have goals
author: Harvey Specter

quote: Power is only given to those who are prepared to lower themselves to pick it up.
author: Ragnar Lothbrok

quote: The people you love... they're weapons that will be used against you.
author: Thomas Shelby

quote: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
author: Sherlock Holmes

quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Winners don't make excuses when the other side plays the game.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I'm not a traitor to my class. I am just an extreme example of what a working man can achieve.
author: Thomas Shelby

quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I don't get lucky. I make my own luck.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: It's not bragging if it's true.
author: Harvey Specter
